text: Kamaghɨn, an haman dav suegh, ofa gamir dakozim avarazir brasɨn evarimɨn ingarigh anevaragh. Gumazir kaba uan arazir kurabar bangɨn ariaghire. Eghtɨ men avim isizir gumazibar brasɨn itariba, brasɨn evarimɨn otoghtɨ, gumazamiziba brasɨn evarir kamɨn ganigh fogh suam, me gumazir kabar mɨn arazir kurar kam damuan kogham.”
